description: This is a citation of an electronic source, such as a YouTube video.

ES-authors.title: ES-authors
ES-authors.description: Author(s) of the electronic source, in order of appearance, written as <first name><space><middle name><space><last name><comma>. In the case of a video, the channel/person that uploaded it.

ES-city.title: ES-city
ES-city.description: City the electronic source was created in

ES-state_province.title: ES-state_province
ES-state_province.description: State/province the electronic source was created in

ES-country_region.title: ES-country_region
ES-country_region.description: Country/region the electronic source was created in

ES-year.title: ES-year
ES-year.description: Year the electronic source was published

ES-month.title: website-month
ES-month.description: Month the electronic source was published

ES-day.title: website-day
ES-day.description: Day the electronic source was published
